# Read data

## Cpx

```{r}
qn <- dir(pattern = "^ND.*o$") %>>%
  set_names %>>%
  map(dir, pattern = "\\.qnt$", all.files = TRUE, full.names = TRUE) %>>%
  unlist() %>>%
  map(read_qnt)
```
